articles.content: Just a few days ago, we published an article on Biogen (NASDAQ: BIIB) and how its Alzheimer's drug that could change the world was potentially soon to be approved. The markets clearly thought it had … [+8886 chars]

articles.title: Virgin Hyperloop Completes First Passenger Test Through Vacuum Tube, Hits 107 MPH - CarScoops
articles.description: The Virgin Hyperloop imagines a network of systems around the world.
articles.content:
The first passenger test of the Virgin Hyperloop has been completed in what the company views as a pivotal moment in the future of transportation.
